ValidationRule.description: Information is complete enough for credit decision.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Credit_Decision__c), TEXT(Credit_Decision__c) = "Accepted", From_Radius__c = FALSE, ReadyforCreditDecision__c = FALSE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The following checks and fields must be complete before an "Accepted" credit decision can be made: Sense Check, Existing Account Check, Fraud Check, Periodic Assessment, Dunning Classification, Risk Category.
